block.name: Throttle
block.doc: Limits the data throughput to the specified sampling rate. This prevents GNURadio from consuming all CPU resources when the flowgraph is not being regulated by external hardware (ie: audio source/sink or USRP source/sink).

param.name: Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Input and output are complex values.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Input and output are floating point (real) values.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Input and output are integer values.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Input and output are short integer values.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Inputs and output are byte values.

param.name: Sample Rate
param.doc: Specifies the sample rate to limit the flowgraph to.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
